title: Part (a)

descriptions: The response does not indicate that the bond is covalent.

The response indicates that the bond is covalent. title: Part (e)(iii)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response indicates that the molecule is polar.

The response indicates that the molecule is not polar. (No explanation is required; however, the molecule is not polar because the dipoles formed by unequal sharing of electrons in the C−Cl MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFGc9crFfpeea0xh9v8qiW7rqarpfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vspeea0xc9Wrpe0=vr0=iq0xXdbba9pGe9FHe9aspf0xe9Fve9Fve9 qapdbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaae4qaiabgkHiTi aaboeacaqGSbaaaa@3D7B@ bonds cancel due to the symmetry of the molecule.)
